content: The mixture of KBH­(2-mim)3 (0.043 g), 4-pyrazolecarboxylic acid (0.042 g), and zinc acetate­(0.080 g), in a water (H2O, 1 mL)/isopropyl alcohol (2 mL)/dimethylformamide (DMF, 2 mL) solution, was placed in a 20 mL vial. The sample was heated at 80 °C for 3 days and then cooled to room temperature. After washing with ethanol and distilled water, the colorless crystals were obtained.
clean_text:
Experimental Section

Synthesis of the BIF-108-Zn Crystal

The mixture of KBH(2-mim)3 (0.043 g), 4-pyrazolecarboxylic acid (0.042 g), and zinc acetate(0.080 g), in a water (H2O, 1 mL)/isopropyl alcohol (2 mL)/dimethylformamide (DMF, 2 mL) solution, was placed in a 20 mL vial. The sample was heated at 80 °C for 3 days and then cooled to room temperature. After washing with ethanol and distilled water, the colorless crystals were obtained.
